name: SWAMI SIVANANDA MEMORIAL INSTITUTE OF FINE ARTS & CRAFTS

address: SSMI Road No 31, East Avenue, East Punjabi Bagh, New Delhi-110026

briefDescription: 1.Free education to 1000 children2. Special Need Program for early intervention to children and Balwadi (playschool) for 3+ . 200 children in the program3. Supplement nutrition prepared by 103 women for 19000 beneficiaries under 6 years of age , pregnant & lactating mothers and adolscent girls4. Comprehensive Community Eye care program with technical support from All India Institution of Medical Sciences. 3000 beneficiaries per year5. Clinical and counselling support to Sex workers for HIV AIDS. 1000 beneficiaries5. Vocational cum production training for women and women  artisans in Textile and Food Industry. 300 women trained every year and 80 earn through the production center.
